title: Elite Training Desk puts laptop, tablet & phone in reach, all wires tucked out of the way
content:
The new adjustable Elite Training Desk provides a secure platform to keep electronics and training fuel within reach, while you focus on chasing personal bests in Watopia. Using solid materials and construction, the adaptable design should work with whatever you ride inside, while still managing to fold out of the way when not in use.

The post Elite Training Desk puts laptop, tablet & phone in reach, all wires tucked out of the way appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
